articles.description: The release date of Rani Mukerji and Saif Ali Khan starrer Bunty Aur Babli 2 has been postponed owing to the fresh rise in Covid-19 cases. The film was earlier slated to hit theatres on April 23. A new release date for the film is yet to be announced.
articles.content:
Mumbai: The release date of Rani Mukerji and Saif Ali Khan starrer Bunty Aur Babli 2 has been postponed owing to the fresh rise in Covid-19 cases.

articles.description: Gul Panag poked some fun at her younger self for not knowing how to do her hair and makeup well, when she participated in the Miss Patiala beauty pageant.
articles.content:

articles.title: After Aamir Khan, R Madhavan tests Covid-19 positive; shares hilarious 3 Idiots post: 'One place we don’t want Raju in' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: R Madhavan has shared a creative post to announce that he has been diagnosed with Covid-19. His 3 Idiots co-star Aamir Khan had also tested positive on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Looks like Virus has finally caught Rancho and Farhan by their cuffs. On Thursday, actor R Madhavan shared the news with his fans that he has tested positive for the coronavirus.

articles.description: Abhinav Shukla and Sidharth Shukla are poking fun at each other on Twitter. The two got into a mock fight over Sidharth's recent tweets.

articles.title: Inside Kangana Ranaut’s birthday party: Actor celebrates with Ashwiny Iyer, Ekta Kapoor, Anupam Kher post Thalaivi launch - The Indian Express
articles.description: After launching the trailer of Thailaivi in Chennai and Mumbai on Tuesday, Kanaga Ranaut celebrated her birthday with Ashwiny Iyer, Ekta Kapoor, Anupam Kher, Vivek Agnihotri and Pallavi Joshi. Members of her Thalaivi team were also present.
articles.content: Kangana Ranaut had one hectic birthday on Tuesday, which was packed with Thailaivi trailer launches in Chennai and Mumbai. The actor finally let her hair down later that day to celebrate her birthday… [+3183 chars]
